name: Ext_R3_ResearchStudy_jurisdiction
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ResearchStudy.jurisdiction for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchStudy.jurisdiction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchStudy|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Indicates a country, state or other region where the study is taking place.
element.comment: `ResearchStudy.jurisdiction` maps to R4 `ResearchStudy.extension`. To multiple elements in ResearchStudy: (`ResearchStudy.location`, `ResearchStudy.extension`). Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ResearchStudy.jurisdiction` maps to R4 `ResearchStudy.location`. To multiple elements in ResearchStudy: (`ResearchStudy.location`, `ResearchStudy.extension`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Indicates a country, state or other region where the study is taking place.
element.comment: `ResearchStudy.jurisdiction` maps to R4 `ResearchStudy.extension`. To multiple elements in ResearchStudy: (`ResearchStudy.location`, `ResearchStudy.extension`). Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ResearchStudy.jurisdiction` maps to R4 `ResearchStudy.location`. To multiple elements in ResearchStudy: (`ResearchStudy.location`, `ResearchStudy.extension`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Countries and regions within which this artifact is targeted for use
